pullRequest.title: feat(UI): Added new site role 'CLEARING_EXPERT'
pullRequest.bodyText:
Please provide a summary of your changes here.


Issue #820 Added a new Role Clearing Expert,
fixed bug where in adding SITE role to a user was not reflecting in couch db.
No changes in dependencies.

Issue:
Suggest Reviewer


How To Test?

Adding a new site role to a user should reflect in couch db.
All user with role Clearing Expert, should be able to view and edit the Clearing Request under their department.
No additional tests implemented.

Checklist
Must:

 All related issues are referenced in commit messages and in PR

Signed-off-by: akapti abdul.mannankapti@siemens.com
